locations.content: Pilot Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ in there. The shower I used was clean and stocked with everything I needed and on 7/8/25 that man (didn‚Äôt get a name) cleaning on the evening shift was working hard keeping the shower clean and available to accommodate the line. Over all it ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ people do you have working your employee Keith is standing around talking to 2 other employees so I asked him who is cleaning showers he said nobody and I asked him well why ain't one of y'all cleaning showers he tells me he can cancel my ‚Ä¶
The guy cleaning the showers here during the day is good worker shower was clean he was polite and helpful great to see a worker doing his best i appreciate people like this
Clean food was great coming out of there man shower nice
Nice facility with a good amount of parking but they need to check their laundry facilities for metal shavings in their bath towels got my neck all scratched up using the shower towel!

Passing through and stopped here to take a nice hot shower and Pilot did not disappoint. The cleaning attendant was very kind and the shower was super clean. Also had to use the laundry and it worked great as well. Highly recommend!

This is a really clean pilot! The showers are nice and the temperature doesn't change when someone flushes! It was nice to have a good shower. They are hard to find when driving over the road. Thank you Pilot! Staff is really nice and ‚Ä¶

Had to pay for parking, then later when I went in to take a shower the night shift decided they didn't want to clean showers and put up a sign saying showers will be under maintenance (being sprayed?) and will be available in the morning... ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ about getting towed till the morning when I was able to resolve the issue! They went above and beyond and offered me free coffee and gave me a free shower in the meantime! Super great staff and people working there.... Highly recommend....

Overall appearance. 5
Restrooms 4
Parking lot 5
Showers 5
Customer service.always 3 people willing to help as well as shower attendant.
Scale rating 1 to 5 being the highest
I drive average  12000 mikes a month.this one is better than most

showerReviews.reviewText: Hoss I've always stopped here everytime I passed and let me tell you something, coffee keeps me awake(free refill with jug purchase), shower is alright(need shower pass), if you need warmth then do ONLY crystal or else you left with itch. I ‚Ä¶

I have been taking showers here for ten years when I work in Crossville the new owners charge 11.00 for showers that have not been cleaned since they bought ,mold around the showers no soap I ask 3 days for soap an employee finally told me ‚Ä¶
Clean shower $10, hot water, very clean store. And best of all sweet staff and decent food. Will definitely be returning here. Forget the pilot down the street.
Like this truck stop it nice a quiet clean rooms very clean.people are very polite.has scale, diesel , shower, dairy queen inside
Nice parking .... But coldist shower I have had in years

showerReviews.reviewText: Nice place but shotty construction for a new facility unlike any other TA/Petro location. Shower doesn't fit anyone over 5'10" without hitting their head. All tiles are crooked and sloppily installed, the contractor should be ashamed of ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ I‚Äôm going down the road with no hours. That $17 shower is the last money you‚Äôll ever see from me. 12 years doing this and I‚Äôve never had to worry about getting kicked out of an unmarked spot at a major truckstop. Absolutely ridiculous.

This TA Express location has tone one of the worst that I have ever visited. The from the poor plumbing in the showers to the insane amount of reserve parking. I had to stand in line to get a simple shower because the their system was not ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ I didn't catch his name but the man cleaning the showers on 6/6/24 around noon is extremely rude.  I told him my door code wasn't working and tried to show him the receipt and he cut me off and told me to go recheck my number on the screen ‚Ä¶
Had to give this TA 5 stars just because the shower cleaning guy... was very nice and let me wash my feet in his laundry room (which he really didnt have to,  but did)... ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ and clean. My boyfriend got 2 orders of breadsticks and he said the breadsticks are fine but the marinara sauce that came with it was watery, didn‚Äôt really have a taste. The shower pressure was awesome. Great hot water.  Overall 3 stars.

Nice place for truckers but needs improvement in 2 areas. The app doesn't work for fueling and showers and I was forced to use the kiosk. The sink water pressure in the shower  isn't enough to rinse the razor when shaving and you can't ‚Ä¶

Restaurants closed earlier than posted hours! No hooks in showers!!! Nor anywhere to put a shower bag/ clothes besides the dirty floor. Poor lighting in showers. At all TA/Petro supposed to get 2 towels, only get 1 here and they refused to ‚Ä¶
Was going to park $20 shower $15 and eat here but couldn't get any football on the TV. Couldn't get anything on the TV. I left. May I suggest cable TV?  Large TV and nothing to watch?
First stop there. Took shower and it was so nice and clean , the hubby went and got pasta dinners for us  And the coffee was great . Definitely will be our stop off 40 from now on !!!

locations.title: Petro Travel Center

showerReviews.reviewText: So I had a pleasant experience at this Petro. I do prefer them over Ta. I fuel and shower at loves usually but I needed to do a Pm and some other stuff and I don‚Äôt use loves for that anymore. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ which way you want to fall of your bed lol. Store was beat and clean, service providers where in point with greeting abs friendliness. Showers where clean pressure of water was awesome. But‚Ä¶.. there is visible mold in the shower, like ‚Ä¶

The remodel in the showers gives new meaning to "water closet". Extremely small, terrible ventilation (floors, walls, everything's wet when you're done). Had to step into the shower to open the door to get out.

Very disappointed, my husband and I went to shower and wanted a plate to go from the deli , unfortunately there was a young big lady who refused service to my husband , maybe because he‚Äôs Hispanic and before us to an Asian gentleman, we had ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ pumps aren't working. The fuel islands are pretty dirty, and poorly maintained. The showers are pretty clean, but very very hot and humid. You'll be just as sweaty and nasty after your shower as you were before your shower. Not a lot of ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ always a plus. On the other hand, there may be a reason for that. My husband and I decided to take a shower here because we had a lot of time on the load we were under. The showers were very small, and not updated at all. They may have been ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ open another room to use never seen something so lame as this.  Handicapped people have to use it. JUST STUPID.  Ok maybe I was harsh she was just doing her job well. Nice person but still don't clean it without open one shower bathroom.

‚Ä¶ Took a shower team shower, was put into a tiny shower than was older than dirt with the old TINEY shower stall with a door that one person could barely turn around in the whole unit let alone two. Switched us to the handicapped shower where ‚Ä¶

My wife and I are team truck drivers so we share a shower. The shower was so small both of us barely fit. The restaurant closed the buffet early did not put out a breakfast buffet ended up ordering chicken tenders. Took FOREVER.  The only ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ Good space for dog to chill out.  I actually didn't do much inside except get a shower.  Shower here were clean and no wait.

showerReviews.reviewText: Everything is good but im stop here take a break and shower üöø but water is not good for showers ‚Ä¶

Shower Room Toilet Seat Was Not Wiped Clean At All & Really Most of The Shower Rooms At Loves TRUCK Stops This is A Ongoing Real Problem That Needs To Be Addressed immediately!! It's Still way To Much Going ON & Around For This To Go ON ‚Ä¶

Stopped to switch drivers here and get a shower. Shower was cold for a minute but got hotter. We stop here pretty regularly and it‚Äôs a nice location. I like the Love‚Äôs with McDonald‚Äôs because I use the app while I‚Äôm getting fuel and just ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ on her face was extremely rude to my daughter and mother. The bathroom was out of service, the kind woman at the front gave them a key to use the bathroom in the shower. The rude woman went and harassed them as they were leaving the ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ . They have so many choices for a snack & drink or even a quick meal. They also have very nice & clean restrooms, a place to take a shower or wash clothes. What I liked best was their very big selection of foods & snacks & drinks!!! Our ‚Ä¶
Appreciate a clean shower. Thanks

Stopped for a shower after driving all night. Waited patiently for Abt 30 minutes before I said anything and got attitude right away. So I walked to the back to see if anyone was cleaning them and some girl Bobbi was standing in the back ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ is an okay loves for truckers. Quick stop...huddle House across the street for food. Too many 4 wheelers, people, and children for it to be a comfortable stop. Not enough stalls in the bathroom, men's or woman's. Expect a wait for a shower.
‚Ä¶ Hope you don't want to get a shower today 8/4/17, between 8am-11am. they shut off the water for maintenance and only have a small sign on the door.

showerReviews.reviewText: We stopped in,we were tired from the road. We needed a shower . The ladies who waited on us were very nice.  We got two showers . We bought one and got the other free.  The shower had hot water , clean towels. I liked that it had a blow ‚Ä¶
A Great Place Too Take A Shower and Break While Out On The Road = Food Is All So Good

‚Ä¶ Literally at the time all the trucks are coming in for the night! So thank you very much! And be nice to clean the shower heads every once in a while pressure sucks beyond anything. But hey thanks!
Some one work in TA really nice. After I shower. I forgot phone . They keep it and give back to me. Thank you ‚ù§Ô∏è
It's typical ta plus point are  big parking lot .food court no waiting for showers. But management is slappy .I used a shower here.
One of the cleanest showers for truckers. Only downfall is that the shower is a little small. Friendly employees and very helpful.

Don't why I stop here. Always something wrong w the fuel or def. Finally last night the fuel was working only to get up this morning 2 hours earlier than I need to for a shower. No showers? U would think I would have learned  by now.
Good place to park and shower need a real restaurant so tired of all the truck stops thinking we don't deserve to have a good meal and only want junk food
Always like stopping here to fuel,shower and eat.
